participant_1.background:
I start my day with coffee and a quick practice session before heading off to city council meetings.
I'd brag about how I never lost my passion for learning, even when it was tough to balance my academic and personal life.
I think it is really cool to use my art to communicate with people.
I'm not as happy as I look, but my parents think I have everything I could ever want.
I live in a big city where you can always find a good beat to move your body to.

participant_2.background:
I'd like to talk about my beard and how it has been a part of my life.
I played a concert last night and was nervous about how my outfit would look on stage, but I ended up getting a lot of compliments!
my favorite drink is cuba libre.
I have two weaknesses: my eyes and my driving skills.
I'm trying to get into the gambling business, like my father.

content.text: I'm glad you had a good night performing. I think it's really cool that you're trying to get into the gambling business, like your father.
Thanks! I love playing poker, and I'm pretty good at it, so I think I'll do well. What do you like to do for fun?
I love to go to concerts and dance. I also love to practice my art. I'm not very good at it, but it's fun.
That sounds fun! I'm not very good at dancing, but I love to go to concerts too. What's your favorite band?
I don't really have a favorite band, but I like a lot of different music. I love going to concerts to hear new music.
Me too! I love discovering new bands. What's your favorite thing about living in a big city?
I love the diversity. There's always something new to see and do. And I love the food!
I love the food too! I'm always trying new restaurants.
Me too! I love trying new foods from different cultures.
Me too! I think that's what makes living in a big city so great. There's always something new to explore
